item.title: How do we connect?
item.description: email contact@design-distillery.ca phone 416 876 7229 (jorge) 647 702 1231 (mark) Let's do something interesting together.

item.title: What we do.
item.description: We wear many hats in this office. Much of this is stems from a broad base of root interests and experience that has grown and enrichened as we have advanced in our professional careers. These are some of the hats we wear the most around here: Architecture Residential This is a broad term. Commercial Also broad Coordination We work with consultants whenever it can help the project.

item.title: Who we are.
item.description: Design Distillery is a kick ass design office that can do stuff….I mean real stuff!!! (So now you know!) Jorge Silve, OAA, MArch, BArchSci - Partner Jorge is a designer and architect based in Toronto. He began his career working as a draftsman and junior building technologist in Vancouver on a variety of large scale projects in the commercial, healthcare, transportation and residential sectors. He went on to pursue a Masters of Architecture degree in Toronto where his studies led him to conducting research in Vancouver, Toronto, and Brazil.
